text: Enhance your degree plan with a minor. With
over 40 minors to choose from, UHCL has something for every interest.
Explore our 524-acre campus located on a wildlife and nature preserve in the heart                   of Clear Lake’s high tech community.
Most UHCL students don’t pay the full cost of college on their own. Last year, for                   example, two out of three UHCL students received some kind of aid package.

From annual traditions like the Cultural Extravaganza, to faculty vs. student kickball                      games, UHCL's campus activities offer an ideal opportunity to explore life outside                      the classroom.
Looking for a career change? A new career at UHCL could be in your future.

The experience you get here is for a purpose - to give you a better chance at career                   success. And while we’re affordable, we’re a great value because of how far our degree                   takes you.
Apply...and get ready to make an impact on the world!

Beautiful campus. Experienced professors. Hands-on learning. More ways to connect.                         From application to graduation, the University of Houston-Clear Lake is focused on                         engaging students with next-level learning opportunities in and out of the classroom.                         With more than

, we connect you with the people, places and resources to help you thrive. Whether                         you are a freshman or transfer student, or looking for graduate programs or the flexibility                         of online classes, we have you covered. Our goal is for you to graduate feeling capable                         and confident to be successful in whatever path you choose.
What type of student are you?
Whether you're in high school or have already graduated, have a GED or home-school                                     equivalent, our freshman application process is for you.
Do you have transferable college credit hours? You’re off to a great start! Find out                                  more about how to transfer to UHCL.
Looking for an advanced degree to set you apart in your career? Our graduate counse-lors                                  can help you explore degree options and what you need to get started.
Are you from another country and don't currently hold U.S. citizenship or permanent                                     residence status? We welcome you to join us!
Have you attended UHCL before, but not within the last three consecutive semesters?                                     It’s a great time to come back and finish what you started.
Are you looking for training, certifications, or just want to take courses for personal                                  enrichment? We have opportunities that cover many industries and levels.

To aid with the process of Admissions, UHCL has created a secure online tool to check                               the up-to-date status of the application process. You should have received you USER                               ID and password in the mail and via email. With your USER ID and password on hand,                               login to E-Services and check your application status by doing the following:
Enter your User ID and Password
If you forgot the password for your E-Services account — do the following:
Your password will be reset and a new password will be sent
to the email address on file
If you forgot, lost, or never received your USER ID and password — do the following:
Call the Student Assistance Center at 281-283-2722
Ask for help concerning E-Services and your USER ID or Password
Be prepared to provide a valid email address

Join us and take your place among the long line of Hawks who continue to soar.
We are dedicated to helping each Hawk succeed in reaching their goals.
Belong to a community of more than 68,000 proud alumni as a member of the UHCL Alumni                                           Association.
Our faculty and staff involvement is integral to the future of our university, our                                           community, and our world.
UHCL strives to enhance the educational, economic and cultural environment of the                                           region.
